resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all the tasks?
You have no task. Anything to add?

We understand the importance of privacy. In order to more fully present our collection and use your personal information, we have revised our privacy policy and user agreement in detail in accordance with the latest laws and regulations. When you click agree, you have fully read, understood and accepted all of the updated Privacy Policy and User Agreement. Please take some time to become familiar with our privacy policy, and if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
I agree to Privacy Policy and User Agreement
Tick the box above, to proceed.
The email address is badly formatted.
The password should be at least 6 characters with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols.
